content: the garland cowl was designed with my beautiful daughter in mind this cowl has a wonderful drape it is long enough to be worn long or twisted & looped note using a stretchy cast on and bind off is highly recommended depending on yarn selection - cowl must be blocked to reach 60 circumference gauge is not really required for this pattern as long as you are knitting with worsted yarn to shorten or lengthen cowl you will want to decrease/increase by 14 stitches for this pattern to work **~more patterns by galzanne knits~** 1 in lieu of my new **everyday cowls collection e-book** an updated version of this pattern is now available june 2013 this pattern has been reformatted and edited to include new charts and revised garland lace center panel pattern support is **always free too ** visit galzanne knits 2 1 http //www ravelry com/designers/galzanne-knits 2 http //www ravelry com/groups/galzanne-knits
